item.title: Train Sim World® 6: Harlem Line: Grand Central Terminal - North White Plains Route Add-On（新規追加）
item.description: Operate modern and classic equipment as you ferry commuters in and out of the iconic Grand Central Terminal; hurry them across the tightly packed Park Avenue, over the Harlem River, and out to the New York suburbs with Train Sim World®: Harlem Line.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Train Sim World® 6: CSX C40-8W Loco Add-On（新規追加）
item.description: As created for Train Sim World®, the versatile CSX C40-8W is richly detailed and features realistic controls and operating performance. The powerful locomotive wears CSX’s attractive YN2 livery and is authentically suited for duty on Sand Patch Grade.
